attributes.action: Introduce atx for people with a B.M.I tax of 30 or over, i.e obese people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For too long, obese people have been a burden on society. Each year they cost the NHS £3 billion in operations,if they bothered to exercise this would not be the case, theirfore they are destroying the best thing the government has ever done.
As being obese is a choice, i don't think us normal people should suffer as a consequence.
I urge people to do what we all know is right and sign my petition.
